protocol.text: For hypoxia treatment, 14-d-old Arabidopsis seedlings were pretreatment on the wet filter paper containing 1/2 MS solution supplemented with 0.5% (w/v) sucrose at pH5.7 for 1 hour in the dark then placed into a floating platform with roots dipped into 1/2 MS solution contain 0.5% (w/v) sucrose at pH5.7, which was constantly supplied with 3% (v/v) oxygen and 97% (v/v) nitrogen in the dark for the times indicated.

All seeds were sterilized and kept for 3 d at 4ºC in the dark to break dormancy.  Seeds were germinated on 0.8% (w/v) agar plates containing 1/2 Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium supplemented with 0.5% (w/v) sucrose at pH5.7.  The plates were incubated at 22ºC under a 16-h light (81 μmol s-1 m-2)/8-h dark cycle in a growth chamber for 14 d.
Total RNA samples were isolated from frozen tissue of Arabidopsis using the TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen).
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 701021 Rev. 5, Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16.5 hr at 45C on GeneChip Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G

The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
